name: Holometa
description:
This game is made in love of and homage to all of the games that inspired it. If you enjoy Holometa, please support its inspirations as well, including:

Killer Queen Arcade - BumbleBear

Hollow Knight - Team Cherry

Rivals of Aether - Dan Fornace and the Rivals Team

Plunder Panic - Will Winn Games

Bug Fables - Moonsprout Games

Killer Queen Black - Liquid Bit

Witchball - S. L. Clark

If you like what you see and want to learn more, follow the project, or connect with our community, join our discord server!
